name: github_scrape_profile
description: Scrape a GitHub user profile including bio, stats, pinned repositories, and contribution activity.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('.vcard-fullname, [itemprop="name"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const login = document.querySelector('.vcard-username, [itemprop="additionalName"]')?.textContent?.trim() || '{{username}}'; const bio = document.querySelector('[data-bio-text], .user-profile-bio, [itemprop="description"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const company = document.querySelector('[itemprop="worksFor"], .vcard-detail [aria-label="Organization"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const location = document.querySelector('[itemprop="homeLocation"], .vcard-detail [aria-label="Home location"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const followers = document.querySelector('a[href*="followers"] span, a[href*="followers"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const following = document.querySelector('a[href*="following"] span, a[href*="following"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const repos = document.querySelector('.UnderlineNav a[data-tab="repositories"] .Counter, a[href*="?tab=repositories"] .Counter')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const pinned = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.pinned-item-list-item, [data-testid="pinned-item"]')).map(p => { const nameEl = p.querySelector('.repo, a span.repo'); const descEl = p.querySelector('p.pinned-item-desc, p.mb-2'); const langEl = p.querySelector('[itemprop="programmingLanguage"], span.repo-language-color + span'); const starsEl = p.querySelector('a[href*="/stargazers"], .pinned-item-meta svg.octicon-star + span'); return { name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', description: descEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', language: langEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', stars: starsEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }; }); return { name: name, username: login, bio: bio, company: company, location: location, followers: followers, following: following, public_repos: repos, pinned_repos: pinned, url: window.location.href }
